name: Skeet Shooting Championship 3D: Clay Hunt Full
name_original: Skeet Shooting Championship 3D: Clay Hunt Full
description:
Everybody likes dynamic shooting games. All the more like to win. Welcome to Skeet Shooting Championship 3D: Clay Hunt - exciting shooting at clay plate shooting game. Start with loading your gun, choose shooting range and show yourself as great accurate shooter! Aim carefully and don't miss the clay plate. You know this pro!cess is called pidgeon shooting. Try different guns to chooxe the best one. It's important to get a lot of points. The more points you get the more various kinds of weapon you can buy and unlock.

Show off your shooting talents and hit rapidly flying targets from different angles. Try yourself in clay shooting at different shooting ranges – regular shooting range, Siberia and Wild West! Always keep your weapon alert - your clay plate may appear anytime! Be ready to shoot and become a skeet champion with Skeet Shooting Championship 3D: Clay Hunt.

Skeet Shooting Championship 3D: Clay Hunt, key features:

- Simple but addictive gameplay. Time spins away.
- User-friendly interface and intuitive control
- Realistic 3D grahics
- Different shooting ranges
- A lot of hunting rifles and shotguns

Download Skeet Shooting Championship 3D: Clay Hunt and shoot as many fluing clay plates as you can
